ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] REST versioning
ygData.msgSnippet: If I understand the question correctly, if the intent is to preserve backwards compat, then consider designing representations that are backwards compatible.

back=
wards compat, then consider designing representations that are  
backwards =
compatible. Other solutions as suggested by Peter and others  
are meant fo=
r cases when changes are not necessarily compatible.
